snippet.title: Team Rhea's lies EXPOSED; Did Mumbai Police suppress WhatsApp chats? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront today, Rahul Shivshankar takes us through the latest developments in the Sushant Singh Rajput Death investigation and the leaked June 14 WhatsApp chat between Dipesh Sawant & Sushant’s friend Kushal Zaveri.

According to the chat, ‘murder’ cannot be ruled out. In the midst of anxiety, Deepesh was allegedly thinking of advertisement revenue. Did Mumbai Police suppress these chats? Was Team Rhea shamefully hiding the truth? What happened on June 14?

Rajya Sabha MP Subramanian Swamy, says, ‘It’s a big cover-up. SSR case will not only lead to vindication & justice for him but also lead to justice for Bharat Mata. Mumbai Police is already complicit’.

While, Political Analyst, Tanvi Pruthi, says, ‘Let CBI finish its investigation’, BJP, National Spokesperson, Sambit Patra lashes out at Maharashtra Government and Mumbai Police, says ‘This is not just about one person called Sushant Singh Rajput. It’s about the cartel and the nexus. The incompetence of the Mumbai Police is calculated’.

Meanwhile, Times Now confronts Team Rhea but they have no answers. Rhea Chakraborty will be summoned again by CBI tomorrow for the fifth consecutive day.

Watch!

snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Times Now has been accessing Whatsapp chats, call data records, that were deleted by Rhea Chakraborty and her entire team. We are putting entire controversy and conspiracy at the back of the controversy to rest. Sensational new Rhea Chakraborty drug transcripts put Bollywood ‘high-rollers’ under the scanner. Cartel allegedly kept Sushant Singh Rajput drugged. Why betrayed Sushant Singh Rajput and his family?

Chat 1: 'Getting green for Rs 5000, 1 bag', Dipesh Sawant to Rhea. 'We currently have a hash, right?', Rhea to Dipesh.
Chat 2: ‘Chim, you back?’ Simone Khambatta (Rhea’s friend) to Rhea. ‘Dude, Bhubaneswar is the scene,’ Rhea to Simone. ‘Best weed ever,’ Rhea to Simone.

Kangana Ranaut  reacts to drug chat expose, says, ‘more than willing to blow the lid off.’ Rhea Chakraborty's role completely EXPOSED by flatmate Pithani. Rhea destroyed evidence. 

Supreme Cout Advocate Ishkaran Singh Bhandari says "If Sushant was drugged, then it straight away becomes a murder case. Now that NCB has registered a case, it now becomes important to find out who’s supplying and who’s using it."

Lawyer Shehzad says, The Mafia Bollywood Drug Aghadi. Sushant was continuously being drugged and it’s clearly ‘LOVE, DRUGS, AND DHOKHA.’

#IndiaForRheaArrest

snippet.title: ED unearths 'Drug link' in SSR's case, Rhea Chakraborty & associates under lens | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, The angle no channel is reporting, Rhea Chakraborty drug ‘use’ and ‘dealing’ EXPOSED. Incriminating WhatsApp messages examined. The family had raised red-flag in February. Do drug tentacles lead to high places? 

Enforcement Directorate ED unearths alleged ‘drug cartel’ link. Reported Proof: Rhea & associates’ chats.

TIMES NOW accesses the CDR of Sandip Ssingh. He was in touch with the Mumbai Police I.O & the ambulance driver on consecutive days after the death of SSR. But the ambulance driver claims that he only coordinated with cops.

Lawyer of SSR Family Vikas Singh says "Everyday Police is acting on any complaint reported on a phone call on 100. So, it’s a bogie by Mumbai Police that written communication was to be given." 

Author Anand Ranganathan counters Political Analyst Tehseen Poonawalla over his remarks. The debate gets heated.

snippet.title: Sushant Singh Rajput's autopsy was sabotaged, Why was it buried till 70-days? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, 70 days after Sushant Singh Rajput's tragic death, we are at the turning point of this entire saga. First time ever in the last 70 days, Times Now establish that there has been a lapse. A putatively criminal delay in conducting a postmortem of Sushant Singh Rajput. Times Now carried out a sting on a member of Maharashtra forensic department. He said a delay of over 12hrs could have degraded evidence.

Top forensic expert reveals on candid cam that ‘toxic trace lasts only for 6 hours’.

The entire investigation was botched up, and this can only happen if there’s deep collusion. says, Lawyer Shehzad.

CBI must 1st interrogate every person involved in the investigation. If the time of death isn’t mentioned, how can the investigation begin? Unless time is known PM report is ‘toilet paper.’ says, Advocate Ishkaran Singh Bhandari

#SSRDeathDisclosure

snippet.title: Sonia Gandhi to continue as permanent boss, No opportunity for merit? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, A big meeting of Congress working committee (CWC). Sonia Gandhi was supposed to resign on the basis of another successor. It should not have been from the Gandhi family. After 7 hours of deliberation, Sonia Gandhi is going to continue.    

Suspended Congress leader Sanjay Jha says, "This letter is not a synthetic or cosmetic attempt to bring about change within the Congress party." 

Political Analyst Sumanth Raman says Kapil Sibal shouldn’t have jumped the gun and put out that tweet. This is the problem with Congress, they can’t agree on anyone else.

#GandhiMuktCong

snippet.title: The Kamala Harris FACTOR; Can India expect special treatment? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Kamala Harris has become a first mixed-race woman in America to accept the nomination for a major US presidential ticket. Power & glory to Indian Americans as pollsters predict Harris is X-factor. 

Kamala Harris was a safe choice, the Indian vote is very important. Kamala Harris calls herself South Asian, why don't she introduce herself as an Indian-American. says, the Founder Republic Hindu Coalition Shalabh Shalli Kumar.

We should remember that Kamala Harris is not really playing for India, she's playing for the U.S. says, TOI Diplomatic Editor Indrani Bagchi.

Kamala Harris said that she is a black American woman who is proud of her Indian heritage. says, TOI Foreign Correspondent Chidanand Rajghatta.

snippet.title: Cops opened doors for suspect in SSR's case; Is 'Team Rhea's' game finally over? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront today, Rahul Shivshankar takes you through latest inputs in Sushant Singh Rajput’s death Case and a sting operation conducted by Times Now reporters which will blow open the CBI probe.

Unofficial & unauthorized entry suspected of Rhea Chakraborty in Cooper Hospital’s morgue was suspected by Times Now; Today, Sushant’s family has slammed cop ‘complicity’ and CBI is now hunting for the mastermind.

Mortuary officer at Cooper Hospital confirms that no one is allowed to enter the morgue, even the family of the deceased. The sting raises questions on Rhea's 45-minute visit to the morgue.

What was Rhea Chakraborty doing in the morgue for 45 minutes?

Sushant’s Family’s Lawyer, Vikas Singh says, ‘There was no relationship between Sushant and Rhea at the time of his death. Somebody at the hospital is helping Rhea to get entry at the morgue. Also, during the funeral of Sushant Rhea wasn’t even in the list of the 20 invitees’.

Political Analyst, MR Venkatesh, says, ‘CBI must include the ‘Destruction Of Evidence’ into the FIR and the officers responsible must be pulled up. In Arushi case, the evidence was tampered with beyond repair’.

While, Senior Lawyer, Mahesh Jethmalani takes you through two lapses on part of Mumbai Police; Advocate DK Rai states, ‘A live media trial is being conducted in the case’.

WATCH!

#RheaGameOver #TimesNowForCBIForSSR #RheaChakraborty

snippet.title: Rhea's unauthorized links to Dubai EXPOSED; CBI now focuses on 'Murder' link  | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront today, Rahul Shivshankar takes you through latest inputs in Sushant Singh Rajput’s death case. The CBI teams have reached Mumbai and their focus will clearly be on ‘murder’ and not ‘suicide’.

snippet.title: Dramatic twist arises after Supreme Court's verdict; How will Maha Govt react now? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront today, Rahul Shivshankar talk about the most crucial case present right now in India, a foresee landmark verdict and a historic fight. Supreme Court pronounced its verdict on the Sushant Singh Rajput Death Case by given hopes to millions and millions of people.

Sushant’s family has defeated all the odds. The Apex has only trusted the CBI, leaving, Uddhav Thackeray’s Government’s ‘Khaki Sena’ jolted. On parallel probe by Mumbai Police in SSR case- There is no scope for parallel probe

Is a parallel probe ordered to subvert CBI?

The panel also led some alluring conversation. While, Political Analyst Sumanth Raman said, ‘The SC order doesn’t state any wrongdoing on part of Mumbai Police. And, the order also states, Mumbai Police can’t be faulted for the steps it has taken in the investigation’; JD(U) leader Ajay Alok said, ‘The SC has laid down the orders, and all sides will have no other option but to abide by it’.

However, MP, Rajya Sabha, Subramanian Swamy claimed a huge charge against the Maharashtra Government, saying, ‘Uddhav Thackeray and his Home Minister Anil Deshmukh is either bluffing or ignorant’.

snippet.title: Supreme Court to decide on Sushant case, Will verdict end slander campaign? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Padmaja Joshi, we discuss the Sushant Singh Rajput death probe and the biggest verdict in the case which will be delivered by the Supreme Court on 19th August at 11 am. The Supreme Court will be deciding whether the case can be given to the CBI and whether the Bihar police has any jurisdiction in investigating this case.    
This judgement is precisely after 64 days of Sushant Singh Rajput's death. A single-judge bench led by Hrishikesh Roy will be pronouncing the verdict in this case on pleas related to Rhea Chakraborty VS state of Bihar and others. Will the top court's verdict end the slander campaign?

snippet.title: Aamir Khan meets Turkish first lady, Does he back anti-India Islamo fascists? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront today, Rahul Shivshankar takes you through the massive controversy that erupted after Bollywood Actor Amir Khan met Turkish First Lady. In 2015, Amir had addressed the press stating that he does not find India as ‘safe’ place to live and now pictures of him meeting an Anti-India Activist has emerged.
This meeting comes just after Turkey openly backed Pakistan sponsored Kashmir separatist movement. Turkish Government, recently, also converted former Catherdral and museum, Hagia Sophia, into a mosque. Why was this meet taken up by Aamir Khan?
‘When Amir Khan talked about his wife leaving India in 2015, then maybe he must have thought of going to Turkey and settling down there’ says Author Anand Ranganathan. While Senior Advocate Sanjay Hegde says, ‘Amir Khan's wife Kiran Rao wanted to leave India please note, it’s his wife’ and Political Analyst, Abhijeet Iyer says, ‘Several Bond movies were also shot in Istanbul, none of the actors went to meet and click photos’.
Watch!

#AamirAntiIndiaRow

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: Congress' clear link to Bengaluru Violence EXPOSED | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront today, Padmaja Joshi takes you through a big break in the Bengaluru Violence that took place almost a week ago. The riots killed three lives and injured over a hundred people. So far, 264 people have been arrested and 52 FIRs have been filed.

However, what catches our attention is that, it was a Congress leader, who was supposed to be harmed, three congress leaders are booked for their link with riots, yet the Congress is very sympatric towards the rioters. Why?

‘It was not a riot or a clash between 2 groups rather it was an attack by a violent mob and they did this in complete public glare. Congress’ role is 'evident' in almost every riot-like UP riots, Delhi riots’, says, GVL Narasimha MP & National Spokesperson BJP. Whereas, PFI Spokesperson, Abdul Raheem Patel, says, ‘There’s a blanket action going on in Bengaluru wherein a 19-yr-old who is psychologically weak and partially blind youth has been arrested’.

WATCH!

snippet.title: Sushant Singh Rajput's probe botched-up; Is justice in jeopardy now? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront today, Rahul Shivshankar takes you through five new videos which expose the level of mishap, negligence and carelessness made by Mumbai Police and Maharashtra Government in the iconic Sushant Singh Rajput’s Death Case.

Why was Sushant’s probe botched-up? Are shreds of evidence compromised? Is justice in jeopardy now?

Tons of questions bottle up but no answers are provided by anyone. The Maharashtra Government, despite such a mishap, is still not opting for a CBI investigation.

Advocate Rizwan Merchant says, ‘In my entire career I have never seen a crime scene being left open for people, and crucial things there being moved’. While BJP MLA Rahul Narvekar says, ‘Media is doing a more credible job than Mumbai Police. The beauty of Mumbai Police is that whenever they come out of a crime scene they declare that it’s a suicide without any investigation’.

‘This is will be the most historical criminal case, and it’ll shake the roots of the cartels that operate in Mumbai in ‘bumping someone off’ states, Subramanian Swamy, Rajya Sabha MP.

Watch!

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: Mumbai Police delay submitting evidence in Sushant Singh case; was evidence tampered?| India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, we discuss the turning point in the investigation of the Sushant Singh Rajput case. The biggest day in the investigation as more dark ‘truths’ revealed & ‘web of lies’ fall apart. Is a CBI prob vital for ‘supreme’ justice? 

TIMES NOW has accessed evidence that allegedly establishes the Mumbai Police didn’t hand over vital electronic evidence in the shape of Sushant’s mobile phone & laptop to forensic experts for a crucial 24 days.

TIMES NOW has accessed never before seen 4 videos of Sushant Singh with his family that reportedly disproves the theory that his ties to his family were ‘estranged’. 

Under every hearing, some people from the family should be there so that if you miss out any evidence or sequence of events, then you will not be able to contribute to the trial. says, Activist Neelam Katara.

snippet.title: Is Sena scared of CBI probe in Sushant Singh Rajput's case? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Shocking new twist emerges in Sushant Singh death probe. Shiv Sena which heads the government in Maharashtra has menacing warned the Sushant Singh Rajput's family against speaking to the press or asking inconvenient questions. 1st defamed, now dhamki. Sushant’s family threatened. What’s Shiv Sena suppressing? 

Listen in to the 3 sound bytes which prove ‘dhamki’ after ‘slander.’ Listen how Sushant family is being allegedly targeted.

Sushant Singh’s cousin makes a stunning charge – ‘Sushant’s diary tampered with by Mumbai Police.’

Govt of Maharashtra is into double standards. The reason they give for inaction is that SSR family was quiet. When family speaks, they’re finding it uncomfortable. Pithani should also be considered a suspect in the case. There’s something murky in this case. And, when the truth comes out, it’ll be very uncomfortable for Shiv Sena. says, Lawyer for Family of SSR Vikas Singh.

As far as Sanjay Raut is concerned, he reminds me of a shivering cat painted in tiger stripes, and the stripes are now getting washed away in the Mumbai rains. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

#SenaTargetsSSRFamily

snippet.title: Desperate bid by Rhea Chakraborty to muzzle Times Now? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Rhea Chakraborty has decided that she wants Times Now gagged. she doesn't want us to report story anymore. After TIMES NOW’s EXPOSE questioning ‘suicide’ in the Sushant Singh case, Rhea Chakraborty has moved a petition in the Supreme Court against ‘trial in media’. 

BIG revelations from Rhea Chakraborty’s ED interrogation: 
Revelation 1: ‘Rhea told friendly media to back her’
Revelation 2: 'Rhea wanted articles in her favor'
Revelation 3: 'Rhea dialed up top director for help'

TIMES NOW speaks to the ambulance attendant who saw Sushant’s body. He raised suspicion over Sushant’s body, never questioned by the Mumbai Police. Following are his claims: 
•Sushant’s body had turned yellow
•There were marked on his leg
•Both his legs were bent

More worrying is the Maharashtra Govt that is behaving like Idi Amin who said that ‘I can guarantee freedom of speech, but I can’t guarantee freedom after speech’. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

#SushantMurderQuestion

snippet.title: Call data of Rhea Chakraborty obtain, Most calls to Mumbai's top cop? | India  Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Rhea Chakraborty, her brother and other members of the team that she has assembled allegedly to defraud and torment Sushant Singh Rajput is going to exit the Enforcement Directorate office in Mumbai. 

TIMES NOW accesses the startling report details State Police Complaints Authority report that reveals then DCP Bandra Paramjeet Dahiya in 2019 allegedly had a habit of ‘burying’ cases.

After Sushant Singh died, the law requires the local police to conduct an 'inquest' to determine the cause of death. This inquest is supposed to be done within 24 hours. says, Former Attorney General  Mukul Rohatgi.

The days are not far when a politician's name will get directly linked to one of the 6 accused against whom the Bihar police have filed the FIR. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

Bihar government wants to do this investigation because there is a pressure on the Bihar government as the Maharashtra government did not respond to the CBI probe call. says, BJP MP & National Spokesperson Rajiv Pratap Rudy.

#RheaArrestNext

snippet.title: Sushant Singh's never before seen personal diary out but crucial pages ripped off? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivhshankar, TIMES NOW accesses the personal diary of Sushant Singh Rajput. Some crucial pages in the diary have been allegedly ripped off. 

Rajya Sabha MP Subramanian Swamy congratulates TIMES NOW for the BIGGEST DISCLOSURE by accessing the personal diary of Sushant Singh Rajput. The suicide theory has been completely destroyed by this disclosure. says, Subramanian Swamy.

If there was a prize for EXPOSE by media, like it's there in the US, TIMES NOW should get it. TIMES NOW has destroyed the suicide theory. There are a lot of whistleblowers in the Mumbai Police. says, Rajya Sabha MP Subramanian Swamy.

This kind of disclosure should have been a part of the inquest of this case. It is something more than just 'abetment to suicide'. Why is that the postmortem is always done by Cooper hospital for all of the celebrity suicide cases. These are serious serious things that need to be looked into. says, Lawyer for Sushant’s Family Vikas Singh.  

#SushantDiaryOnTimesNow

snippet.title: Lord Ram's glory restored after 500-yrs but puja stings secular LEFT Lobby? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, A billion dreams were realized today, with Bhoomi Poojan at Ayodhya that lays the foundation for the construction of Mandir that will restore lord Ram Chandra ji with its full glory after 500 years of struggle. New cultural dawn awaits Bharat but opposition questions the Bhoomi Poojan ceremony.  

It was not Rajiv Gandhi who ordered the opening of the locks at the masjid, but the district judge of Faizabad who ordered the locks to be opened in 1986. says, Congress MP Shashi Tharoor.

snippet.title: Sushant Singh Rajput Case: State fails to probe foul play? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, A day after Times Now push for justice in Sushant Singh case. The Centre’s ‘poised’ to step-in, but Aaditya Thackeray slams ‘street politics’. 

TIMES NOW has spoken to Sushant Singh's former assistant Ankit Acharya, who lived with the actor before being sacked by Rhea. Ankit claims 'Rhea did jaadu-tona', while Siddharth Pithani watched.

Congress leader Akhilesh Prasad Singh demands CBI probe in the Sushant Singh Rajput death case. 

Aaditya Thackeray's letter is an attempt to play the victim card. says, Lawyer Shehzad.

There's an attempt to create a rift between 2 states. says, Shiv Sena's Tamil Nadu President G Radhakrishnan.

When there's an ADR registered, you don't need F.I.R & Mumbai Police did register the ADR. says, Senior Advocate Rizwan Merchant.

#SushantConspiracyTruth

snippet.title: Sushant Singh's Father exposes cover-up, Can Mumbai Police explain? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, In the ruling political establishment in Maharashtra, there have been individuals in the Police in Bollywood and in our own media who tried to build the conspiracy theory of Times Now faking the Sushant Singh's death. today all those doubters have to eat their words.

TIMES NOW accesses smoking gun which no other channel has accessed. 2 S.O.S messages were sent by Sushant's father via WhatsApp (Feb 19 & 25, 2020) to DCP Bandra, who later acknowledged it in WhatsApp itself.

Mumbai Police official statement says The then DCP Zone 9 had called Sushant’s father & requested him for a written complaint. However, Sushant’s father wanted this case to be ‘resolved informally’.  in an official statement, confirms that it wanted Sushant Singh's father to file a formal and written complaint.

TIMES NOW accesses a High Court judgment that suggests that electronic complaints can be turned into an official complaint and can be acted upon.

#SushantFatherExposesCoverup

snippet.title: Sushant Singh Rajput case: Are Police linked to camp Rhea? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Today is the significant crucial day in what is turning out to be a long-running saga involving a massive cover-up in the Sushant Singh Rajput's case. Enforcement Directorate has formally begun to probe the alleged disappearance of funds from Sushant Singh Rajput's accounts. 

Sushant Singh’s flatmate & confidante speaks up about Sushant’s last days, final call for help, who stood by him & who didn’t and much more.

Sidharth Pithani, a roommate of Sushanth Singh speaks to TIMES NOW's Sowmith. I met Sushant in January. He said he was in a bad shape, his hands were shivering: Sidharth.

Rhea Chakraborty breaks her silence. I have complete faith in God. A lot of horrible things are said about me. I refrain from commenting on the advice of my lawyers. The truth shall prevail. says, Rhea Chakraborty.

#SushantJusticeCampaign

snippet.title: Sushant Singh Rajput's death linked to big names, So CM Uddhav Thackeray blocks CBI? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Murky twist to Sushant Singh Rajput’s death probe. 2 unreported developments. Sushant Singh's trainer makes startling revelations. He claims Sushant started taking medicines which made him anxious and his hands & legs shake. Even parents in FIR alleged Rhea was 'overdosing Sushant'.

Sources reconstruct what happened the night before Sushant’s death; say ‘bid to hide a big name at Sushant's party. Cops claim CCTV was 'not working'.

Rhea Chakraborty’s SC plea accessed. She claims she has been falsely implicated by Sushant Singh’s father & she has no role in Sushant’s death’. 

The family of Sushant Singh is only concerned about his death, not about the money trail. The money trail is only to find out the motive. says,  Lawyer of SSR Family Vikas Singh.

#SushantMysteryDeepens

snippet.title: Sushant Rajput Probe: Are obvious leads strangely ignored? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, The unheard February complaint: Inexplicable ‘commercial’ links on Sushant Singh’s death probe. India demands independent probe.

Congress in Bihar demands CBI probe into the death, Sushant Singh. Earlier today, the Govt of Maharashtra has clarified that probe will not be transferred to CBI as of now.

A CBI inquiry was the demand from the very 1st day itself. Even if the State Govt says no, the Court can overrule this decision. We must ask the lawyer of Sushant Singh's family whether he is in favour of a CBI inquiry. says, Rajya Sabha MP Subramanian Swamy.

The Mumbai Police has completely lost the plot in this investigation. She (Rhea Chakraborty) systematically distanced Sushant Singh Rajput from everyone in his family. Keeping Sushant Singh Rajput away from his father was the 'first ingredient' of the offence of abetment to suicide. Mumbai Police & Rhea Chakraborty were acting in tandem. First, Rhea wanted the case to be transferred to CBI. Now, she wants the case to be investigated by the Mumbai Police. says, Lawyer for SSR Parents Vikas Singh.

#SushantProbeFiles

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: Roaring Rafales land in Ambala, Pakistan & China hear the thunder? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Monumental event today. the Rafale, five of them took off from France and over 48 hours, flying at 30,000 feet, refuelling mid-air, entering the Indian Air Space, having communication with Indian Warship and then finally landing in Ambala to be inducted into the Air Force. this is a game-changing moment in gio-political-military strategy. India purchasing planes after a long hiatus to bolster its Air Force. the golden arrows, that's the formation, the Rafales in the circles of virtue and right next to them the two escorts, the Sukhoi 1 and the Sukhoi 2 at the edge of those circles.

snippet.title: Sushant Singh Rajput's B-town friend betrayed, Did system suppress the truth? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Big twist to Sushant Singh Rajput death case: Sushant’s father steps in and files case against his son’s friend Rhea Chakraborty under various sections including abetment to suicide & cheating. 

Mumbai Police sources tell TIMES NOW.
•Bihar police approached Mumbai Police late today
•Spoke with Sushant Singh's friends last evening
•Bihar Police have been in Mumbai for the past 3 days 

Mumbai Police is complicit as far as the Bollywood is concerned. Cops have been socialising with the industry. That’s why I asked for CBI inquiry. This case can’t be investigated by Mumbai Police. There was absolute fear among Sushant Singh’s family and on that basis, this cartel was operating. says, BJP MP Subramanian Swamy.

I think there was a ‘cabal’ which was totally working against Sushant Singh. says, BJP Spokesperson Shazia Ilmi.

#SushantRheaTwist

snippet.title: Lord Ram to be honoured on August 5, Will opposition stop blocking Bhumi Pujan? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Bhumi Pujan to honour Lord Ram, but Opposition opposes its telecast on Doordarshan. 5-minute show on Haj during Atal Bihari Vajpayee’s regime was not objected. 

Maharashtra Govt mulls relaxation for Bakri Eid in the State. 

I don’t expect the Communists to be sensible. But this takes their ‘lobotomise logic to another level.’ This country is secular but not for Hindus. For every religion, there is a separate rule. says,  Author Anand Ranganathan.

The whole country is celebrating this moment. All party delegation should also be there in Ayodhya on Aug 5. says, Political Analyst Ashutosh.

Lord Ram is a part of our culture but it’s unfortunate that some people are finding certain excuses against this Bhumi Pujan. says, Hindu Activist Rahul Easwar.

A minister (Left) of West Bengal performed Kali Puja in 2007 and then he had to resign from the cabinet. says, BJP MP & National Spokesperson Dr Sudhanshu Trivedi.

#RamBhumiPujanBlockade

snippet.title: India acquires Rafale power, First batch on its way | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, India acquires Rafale power, the 1st batch is on its way which is set to touchdown on July 29. Decisive edge for India in skies. As China & Pak flex muscle, Indian Air Force gets wings of fury. 

New disclosure in ‘Bollywood Pakistan Probe’. 15 Pak ‘agents’ allegedly infiltrated Bollywood. 

India used to be patronising singer Rahat Fateh Ali Khan and he was arrested with tonnes of Indian currency while going to Pakistan and yet no action was taken against him. says, Strategic Affairs Expert Sushant Sareen.

There need to be specific charges against a specific individual. says, Political Analyst Sumanth Raman.

Ignorance may save anyone from culpability but if that person is pretending to be ignorant then that person is ‘culpable’. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

snippet.title: How can India contain China? Should India & United States of America become allies? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, The tussle in Ladakh between India and China over the LAC clashes at Galwan Valley did not only stir the politically and economically but it is now a debate within different countries. Waging a war against China is not easy, but creating an alliance with the United States is still in talks. India has exposed the limitations pertaining to foreign policy. It acts as a consensus that emerges from the knowledge of experts.

After the collapse of the Berlin War and the beginning of the Cold War, India placed its faith in multilateralism. India realized the whole idea of 'friends with all, but allies with no one' policy might have left it vulnerable in the face of Chinese adventurism. 

India now has a cause to correct and look for options to contain China in the subcontinent. Should India as a country formally ally with the United States against China? #India #China #IndiaUpfront #IndiaVsChina

snippet.description:
On India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar, Times Now has accessed a dossier from the Central government that suggests that the US national of Pakistani origin, Rehan Siddiqi works with 2 India conduits to allegedly lure Bollywood stars to participate in overseas, to make money and fund anti-India activity.
Rehan Siddiqi works through 2 other Indian conduits named Darshan Mehta and Rakesh Kaushal.

snippet.title: Sachin Pilot 'Victim' not 'Villain', Congress attack falls flat? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Sensational papers reveal that man who probed Sachin Pilot is allegedly CM Ashok Gehlot's ‘aide’. BJP & Sachin Pilot camp accuse Ashok Gehlot of probe ‘fixing' charge.

It is not just instability within the Congress party but there's also a cocktail of politicised bureaucracy, corrupt politicians & attitude of revenge. The opposition doesn't have faith in the Courts. says, BJP National Spokesperson Sambit Patra.

In Madhya Pradesh, Congress gave away the Govt to the opposition on a silver platter. Troubleshooting is the responsibility of leadership. says,  Congress Suspended Leader Sanjay Jha.

People are now understanding why Sachin Pilot & Ashok Gehlot didn't speak for 18 months. It is the clash of the titles. says, ANI Editor Smita Prakash.

#GehlotPilotProbeTwist

snippet.title: Delhi riots key witness intimidated, Insidious 'Islamist' plot unravels | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Sensational statement accessed on Delhi riots. The fresh FIR states that one of the key witnesses has claimed that he received a death threat over the phone on July 4, 2020, saying ‘you will be killed by Faisal Bhai’. 

Why is it that there is an entire lobby trying to continuously portray Delhi riots not as a killing of 53 Indians but as an onslaught of unwitting Hindus against Muslims? says, Lawyer Shehzad.

It is the politicians who have milked cow of religion time & again. says, Political Analyst Dr Syed Asad Abbas.

Anybody who indulges in this kind of rabble-rousing is not doing any service to this community rather doing an immense disservice to its community. says, Advocate Sai Deepak J.

#DelhiRiotDevelopment

snippet.title: AIMIM MP Imtiaz Jaleel resists 'Bhumi Pujan', Why red-flag PM Modi's visit? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, After 143 years of legal battle, the stage is set for Ram Lalla ‘virajman’. 3-storey mandir to be constructed, but historic Bhumi Pujan opposed as Opposition questions PM Narendra Modi's visit to Ayodhya on August 5. 

A PM is the leader of this country who should never favour any religious sect. says, JD(S)  National Spokesperson Tanveer Ahmed.

In the U.S, politicians do not fight elections on the basis of the church. says, Political Analyst Vivek Srivastava.

Religion matters in every democracy. says, Advocate Sai Deepak J.

I am not all surprised with the fact that PM will be visiting Ayodhya on Aug 5. says, Public Affairs Analyst Rajeev Desai.

#BhumiPujanOpposed

snippet.title: NIA exposes Swapna's-Islamist link, Plan was to hurt the nation? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, ‘Gold for terror’ ring in Kerala: TIMES NOW accesses remand note of the NIA which states that 'the idea was to destabilise India's economic fundamentals'.

Swapna Suresh's former neighbour speaks to Times Now's Vivek K. He alleges that there have been reports of 'comrades' threatening some people after Kerala gold smuggling case, but he didn't get any such calls.

If somebody tries to jeopardise the national security of India, then all investigating agencies and the govt will take effective measures to neutralise & punish them. says, BJP  National Spokesperson Gaurav Bhatia.

Kerala CM didn’t appoint anybody who has been accused in this case. says, CPI(M)  MLA & Spokesperson AN Shamseer.

We often talk about 'Gold Standard of Journalism,' this is the 'Gold Standard of Corruption’ and the Kerala CM should now be called ‘Swarna Minister’. says, Lawyer Shehzad.

#GoldForTerror

snippet.title: BJP hits back over 'Separatist' lesson, New chapter in India's history? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, A journalist was shot by criminals in Ghaziabad’s Vijay Nagar. CCTV captures the brutal attack. The family claims that they filed a complaint about eve-teasing last week. 9 held and an SI has been suspended.  

NCERT Class XII textbook scraps content on ‘Separatism’ in J&K and changes made in ‘Regional Aspirations' chapter in political science. Changes necessitated after the abrogation of Article 370. 

Today it is not just the syllabus of ‘terrorism & separatism’ that has been deleted, but the notion and narrative of Separatism have been deleted by abrogating Article 370. says, Lawyer Shehzad.

#SeparatismScrapped

snippet.title: Karnataka hit by COVID health crisis but medical infrastructure on a ventilator? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Padmaja Joshi, Super Investigation: 5 days, 58 dead on way to Bengaluru hospitals. We show why Bengaluru deaths ‘spiked’ as 11 hospitals reveal ‘apathy’.

Karnataka had fewer incidents of COVID earlier but suddenly there has been a spike. Private hospitals in all cities are not really cooperating as we expect them to do. Certainly hard measures on the way. Karnataka has been one of the best-managed states as far as COVID is concerned. say BJP MP & National Spokesperson GVL Narasimha Rao.

A lot of private hospitals were very reluctant to cooperate with govt authorities in Chennai. say,  Actor Kasturi Shankar.

It is not mismanagement; rather it is ‘corruption’ which is killing COVID in Karnataka. says, JD(S) National Spokesperson Tanveer Ahmed.

Watch!

snippet.title: Row over PM's Ayodhya visit, 'Anti-Modi' not 'Anti-Ram'? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Padmaja Joshi, PM Narendra Modi likely to visit Ayodhya for the 'Bhoomi poojan' ceremony of Ram Temple on August 5. Sharad Pawar, Congress hit out at PM for the visit. Shiv Sena says: We await Ram Mandir invite.

A Coronavirus vaccine developed by the University of Oxford appears ‘safe and triggers an immune response’.

It was just a simple statement made by Sharad Pawar over PM’s planning for Ayodhya visit. says, BJP Spokesperson Mahesh Chavan.

The Ayodhya Trust has been formed by an Act of Parliament as directed by SC. What Sharad Pawar said shows the ‘worst form of vote ban politics’, says, BJP MP & National Spokesperson GVL Narasimha Rao.

This is a calculated jibe by Sharad Pawar is known to way his words carefully so as they achieve their intended political consequences. If something of a grand structure like the construction of a Ram Mandir to be commenced, there would be thousands of people who would be provided jobs Author Anand Ranganathan.

#AghadiMandirHypocrisy

snippet.title: Record of UAE connection EXPOSED in Kerala gold smuggling case| India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Kerala gold smuggling case: Call records point to alleged Gulf ‘Islamist’ terror link. On the day of gold seizure, accused Swapna Suresh & UAE envoy’s gunman allegedly spoke for 3 minutes over the phone. 
Raids were conducted at the residence of Faizal Fareed, the third accused in the Kerala gold smuggling case who is currently in Dubai and to whom a non-bailable warrant has been issued by NIA.
"They are playing the 'Kerala card' for covering up the whole issue is extremely insulting for the state", says Activist Rahul Easwar. 
Kerala CM doesn't know Swapna Suresh. says, CPI (M) Spokesperson AN Shamseer.
This is terror funding & that's why we have to expose the person who's responsible for this. says, BJP National Spokesperson Sambit Patra.
This is a deeply worrying case & it needs thorough investigation. says, Senior Journalist Sumanth Raman.
#KeralaGoldTerrorPlot #KeralGoldSmugglingCase

snippet.title: Is Congress still a party for aspirations? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront Special Edition with Rahul Shivshankar, tremors set up by disaffected youth leaders Jyotiraditya Scindia and Sachin Pilot has bowled into a crisis of legitimacy at the time for Party’s leadership. Not only the leadership’s response been lacking but also the Congress has seemed to have lost its direction after the 2019 Lok Sabha Elections.  

Systematic administrative collusion over the last four decades has been led by the Congress Government. What is triggering this crisis in the party?

‘India has moved on, but somehow the Congress is still stuck in its old mindset. Congress certainly must introspect itself’, says Sudheen Kulkarni Author & Columnist

While a suspended Congress leader says, ‘One of the reasons why today Congress is in the abject shape in which it is because it sacrificed the very foundations on which it was formed’.

WATCH!

snippet.title: AMU student opposes Shaheen Bagh and receives a threat to wear hijab? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, AMU student lodges a complaint against a fellow student who allegedly threatened her on social media that she would be forced to wear a 'brass hijab' once the university reopens because she posted her opinion backing CAA & NRC.

‘Extremism & fundamentalism’ in AMU has long been supported and cushioned by those who belong to the same religious or intellectual ideology. What if a Muslim tomorrow says ‘those who disbelieve in our verses, we will drive them into a fire’? says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

The spontaneous outrage what we just saw happening with the AMU student, it is unconditionally condemnable by every individual. says, Political Analyst Dr Syed Asad Abbas.

In the entire Islamic world, AMU is the oldest university. But unfortunately, the university became the epicentre of Pakistan & 1st Pak PM. says, BJP MP & National Spokesperson Dr Sudhanshu Trivedi.

localized.title: AMU student opposes Shaheen Bagh and receives a threat to wear hijab? | India Upfront
localized.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, AMU student lodges a complaint against a fellow student who allegedly threatened her on social media that she would be forced to wear a 'brass hijab' once the university reopens because she posted her opinion backing CAA & NRC.

‘Extremism & fundamentalism’ in AMU has long been supported and cushioned by those who belong to the same religious or intellectual ideology. What if a Muslim tomorrow says ‘those who disbelieve in our verses, we will drive them into a fire’? says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

The spontaneous outrage what we just saw happening with the AMU student, it is unconditionally condemnable by every individual. says, Political Analyst Dr Syed Asad Abbas.

In the entire Islamic world, AMU is the oldest university. But unfortunately, the university became the epicentre of Pakistan & 1st Pak PM. says, BJP MP & National Spokesperson Dr Sudhanshu Trivedi.

#AMUHijabUltimatum

snippet.title: Land meant for Congress headquarter but bagged by Gandhis, Will NDA take action? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Details of a probe into Rajiv Gandhi Foundation. Gandhi's got 2 acres land for Rs 0. Allotment terms allegedly altered under 4 different Congress governments. 

Former Congress leader & current BJP spokesperson Tom Vadakkan makes a disclosure saying 'Congress Seva Dal was asked to vacate premises (AICC HQ)'.

It seems that Rajiv Gandhi, Sonia Gandhi, Rahul Gandhi & Priyanka Gandhi are ‘haunting’ BJP. says, JDS National Spokesperson Tanveer Ahmed.

People of this country want to know from the Cong party that how they have converted the party into a ‘real estate mafia’. says, BJP MP & National Spokesperson GVL Narasimha Rao.

All lands within NDMC areas vest in the Land and Development Office (LNDO). The LNDO then gives properties on perpetual lease. says, SC Senior Advocate Sanjay Hegde.

The office was supposed to be used as a Congress party office, so we should have access to it. But we were ‘kicked’ out unceremoniously and it was then used for private property. says, Lawyer Shehzad.

#RGFLutyensLandExpose

snippet.title: BJP leader Mehraj-u-Din Malla kidnapped by a terrorist released unharmed | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, BJP leader Mehrajuddin Malla who was kidnapped by a terrorist in the Sapore district of Jammu & Kashmir is been release. Ajay Pandita and Waseem Bari were shot dead, and but now, BJP leader released unharmed?

It is not for the 1st time that political workers are getting kidnapped in J&K. PDP & NC workers have died in Kashmir saving the Kashmir for India says, Columnist Ifra Jan.

One of the early casualties of Jehad was Yousuf Halwai who dared to wave the national flag on August 15, 1989, in Srinagar. says, Activist Sushil Pandit.

snippet.title: Sachin Pilot lay off for seeking due, Rahul Gandhi's glass ceiling in Congress? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Congress removes Sachin Pilot as Rajasthan Dy CM & PCC chief. BJP offers support to Sachin Pilot.

Sachin Pilot is likely to address media tomorrow. Sources: Sachin Pilot can launch his own party.

A party can only survive if it’s all about ‘performance & merit. In politics, there is no such thing as ‘permanent winner or permanent loser’. We all know that in any principal campaign, there is one protagonist who leads the campaign. We all know that in any principal campaign, there is one protagonist who leads the campaign. says, Congress Leader Sanjay Jha.

The fact is that Ashok Gehlot has the majority and we will prove whenever BJP wants. says, Political Analyst Tehseen Poonawalla.

In this battle of the dynast, one must not forget what spawns it, the forming of the dynasty itself. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

#RahulSacksSachin

snippet.title: Kerala Gold Smuggling: Lens on conduit's Neta link, Call records EXPOSED | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Newsbreak on Kerala gold smuggling case. 16 calls were allegedly made between CPI (M) leader KT Jaleel & the accused Swapna Suresh. TIMES NOW accesses call records.

TIMES NOW accesses NIA probe details. 
•Gold smuggling ring active for 1 yr
•Gold was smuggled in personal cargo
•13 flight shipments under the scanner
•Total worth of transactions Rs 50 crore
•NIA tracing ‘beneficiaries’ now

30 kg of gold being smuggled that too in a diplomatic consignment bound for the UAE Consulate General. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

Kerala CM has to take the moral responsibility and this is not a political call as this is beyond politics. says, Activist Rahul Easwar.

#GoldTerrorFundExpose

snippet.title: Talented Sachin Pilot mutinies on principle, Gandhis' backing 'Talent' over 'Taint'? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Rajasthan political crisis ‘deepens’. Gehlot's are linked to the ‘raided’ hotelier in whose hotel MLAs have been kept. ED unearths ‘hawala’ trail as Gehlot’s associate got Mauritius funds. The lens on ‘dubious’ source of Rs 100 crore. 

Congress ally Bharatiya Tribal Party (BTP) withdraws support to Rajasthan Govt. BTP has 2 MLAs. 

Sachin Pilot was made an MP at the age of 26, he was made a Union Minister at 30, he was made PCC chief at 35, he was made Dy CM at 40. says, Political Analyst Sumanth Raman.

Whatever is happening in Rajasthan is a manifestation of a much deeper structural, simmering discontent across the rank & file of the party. Cong is down to 96 seats in 2 LS polls. We have come back to power in MP in 15 years & we gave it back in 1.5 years. By being cool about it, we're destroying Cong & an ideology that needs to be heard in this country says, Congress Leader Sanjay Jha.

Watch!

snippet.title: Farooq-AAP link exposes over Delhi Riots, What will Lobby say now? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar,  Delhi riots: Delhi Police claims that the main accused is linked to AAP; alleges that the AAP MLA was 'intermediary'.

TIMES NOW’s Waji speaks to AAP MLA Haji Yunus over ‘Delhi Riots File Expose’. Nikunj Garg with more details.

‘Delhi Police can put any charges against anybody’, says Haji Yunus.

Delhi HC has observed the lackadaisical approach & inconsistency of Delhi Police on Delhi riots. BJP, that has authority over Delhi Police will target Pinjra Tod, PFI, Safoora Zargar. says, Political Analyst Dr Syed Asad Abbas.

Amanatullah Khan gave a clean-chit to Tahir Hussain when he was arrested. says, BJP National Spokesperson Gaurav Bhatia.

snippet.title: Detailed report of Vikas Dubey encounter, What went down at the site? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, TIMES NOW camera captures an admission by a cop over gangster Vikas Dubey’s encounter. The police were ‘seething’, Dubey’s mother, who was the victim of his ‘suffering’, wished him dead & his suffering victims ‘hail’ police.  

Tracked to Kanpur hospital & shot at by don Vikas Dubey twice in 8 days, police bear ‘brunt’ of bullets.  

Priyank Tripathi speaks to the cop whose gun was snatched by Vikas Dubey when the car overturned

Gangster Vikas Dubey was shot dead by police in an act of self-defence. Everyone is aware of gangster Vikas Dubey's history sheet that he never hesitated to attack cops. says, BJP Spokesperson Manish Shukla.

It doesn’t need rocket science to understand that gangster Vikas Dubey had police & political patronage over a period of 20 years ... Also, there is something fishy about this encounter. says, Lawyer Ishkaran Singh Bhandari.

Fact is you cannot punish a criminal by turning into one & State just did that … 29% of our sitting MPs face criminal charges ... Had Vikas Dubey been alive, he'd have become a politician. Just like a farmer waits for his monsoon & a patient waits for his doctor, a gangster waits for his govt. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

#VikasDubeyEliminated

localized.title: Detailed report of Vikas Dubey encounter, What went down at the site? | India Upfront
localized.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, TIMES NOW camera captures an admission by a cop over gangster Vikas Dubey’s encounter. The police were ‘seething’, Dubey’s mother, who was the victim of his ‘suffering’, wished him dead & his suffering victims ‘hail’ police.  

Tracked to Kanpur hospital & shot at by don Vikas Dubey twice in 8 days, police bear ‘brunt’ of bullets.  

Priyank Tripathi speaks to the cop whose gun was snatched by Vikas Dubey when the car overturned

Gangster Vikas Dubey was shot dead by police in an act of self-defence. Everyone is aware of gangster Vikas Dubey's history sheet that he never hesitated to attack cops. says, BJP Spokesperson Manish Shukla.

It doesn’t need rocket science to understand that gangster Vikas Dubey had police & political patronage over a period of 20 years ... Also, there is something fishy about this encounter. says, Lawyer Ishkaran Singh Bhandari.

Fact is you cannot punish a criminal by turning into one & State just did that … 29% of our sitting MPs face criminal charges ... Had Vikas Dubey been alive, he'd have become a politician. Just like a farmer waits for his monsoon & a patient waits for his doctor, a gangster waits for his govt. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

#VikasDubeyEliminated

snippet.title: Ujjain SP Manoj Kumar Singh briefs media over Vikas Dubey's arrest | India Upfront
snippet.description:
UP’s most wanted gangster Vikas Dubey got arrested in Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh while he was entering the Ujjain Mahakal Temple on Thursday morning. Gangster Vikas Dubey was recognised by Mahakaal Temple staff. We are verifying all facts and are in constant communication with the UP Police. We will share with them whatever further evidence comes to our knowledge. says, Ujjain SP Manoj Kumar Singh.

#VikasDubeyNabbed

snippet.title: BJP worker Wasim Bari killed by terrorists but Lobby won't condemn? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar,  Islamists kill nationalists. Wasim Bari is the 3rd Muslim BJP worker killed in the Valley in the last 3 years. ‘Islamist’ front claims responsibility for the attack. 

These ‘Jihadi fronts’ have a complete nexus with PDP on one hand and TRF on the other. says, Kashmiri Pandit,  Sushil Pandit.

Every Kashmiri has unequivocally condemned the killing of BJP leader Wasim Bari. says, Lawyer Ilyas Nazir.

Rahul Gandhi has not even tweeted yet on BJP leader Wasim Bari’s killing. says, Lawyer Shehzad.

snippet.title: Vikas Dubey caught after 170-hour chase but was shielded for 29 years? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Don Vikas Dubey chased & held for killing 8 cops in Kanpur. But listen to his mother who says that ‘her son Vikas Dubey is with Samajwadi Party'. 

Gangster Vikas Dubey's wife & son have been taken into custody by police in Lucknow. Ujjain cops have handed over gangster Vikas Dubey to U.P STF. Henchman of gangster Vikas Dubey was seen with Akhilesh Yadav.

There is no such thing as ‘lifetime membership’ in the Samajwadi Party. says, SP Spokesperson Ghanshyam Tiwari.

Cong is completely irrelevant in UP politics, but today 2 of its spokespersons played the ‘Brahmin card’ as gangster Vikas Dubey is being arrested for being a Brahmin. says, Lawyer Shehzad.

We were the 1st party to say that gangster Vikas Dubey’s call records of the last 5 years to be made public. says, SP Spokesperson Ghanshyam Tiwari.

Watch the faceoff between Lawyer Shehzad. and SP Spokesperson Ghanshyam Tiwari gets heat up.

#VikasDubeyNabbed

snippet.title: Yes Bank & Choksi funded RGTF, 'Two' many coincidences to ignore? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, As first of its kind probe ordered, ‘Gandhi trust probe’ GETS BIGGER. Rajiv Gandhi Foundation received donations from both Mehul Choksi & Yes Bank.  

All of the investigating agencies have been ‘suborned’. says, Public Affairs Expert Rajiv Desai.

This probe has not been ordered by any of the agencies, it’s MHA which has set up an inter-ministerial committee under the charge of a special directorate of ED. says, TIMES NOW Sr Editor- Internal Security  Nikunj Garg.

‘What if’ PM Modi started a Sambit Patra Foundation or SPF? Why are corporate donations to political parties through electoral bonds anonymous? says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

The ‘sad reality’ is when a political party’s fund rises by 500% after coming into power. says, JDS Spokesperson Tanveer Ahmed 

#GandhiTrustProbe

snippet.title: Congress chains workers to tracker collar, Will watch where you sit & sleep? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar,  Look how Congress ‘treats’ its workers. 

Every political party has been accused of spying, tracking or phone tapping of political opponents & every political party has done it, but for Congress, it comes ‘naturally’. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

In Karnataka, BJP has mastered the art of ‘resort politics’. says, Political Analyst Dr Syed Asad Abbas.

It’s like Congress is treating its cadres like ‘cattle’ in Karnataka. says, BJP MP & National Spokesperson GVL Narasimha Rao.

DK Shivakumar as a KPCC chief introduced a new concept. says, JDS Spokesperson Syed Mohid Altaf.

snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Additional Directorate General of Public Information's 'fire & fury’ on display and Indian Air Force is ready with Sukhois, Globemaster & night ops. snippet.title: China admits it was 'Pushed Back', Will army doubters surrender? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, China admits it was ‘pushed back’ in Galwan. Unseen clash site photos & videos show India hasn’t ceded even an inch of our land. 

China admits 'pushback' at LAC & the video evidence is here. Take a look at this excerpt from a special broadcast of China’s state broadcaster. Video: As aired by CCTV
DISCLAIMER: As translated by Mandarin experts. 

I am not surprised what Indians were doing at the site, I think Chinese were surprised. says,  National Security Analyst Nitin A. Gokhale.

Today’s satellite imagery that has just been released about an hour ago clearly shows that Chinese have withdrawn 1.5 km behind LAC as per the agreement. says, OPR Senior Fellow Abhijit Iyer Mitra.

#ChinaAdmitsPushback

snippet.title: PM Narendra Modi punishes 'Expansionist' China, Doubters put to shame? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, 3 days after PM Narendra Modi's Ladakh visit, India tamed ‘expansionist’ China. ‘Insider’ reveals the full story that it’s a ‘pushback’, not a ‘pullback’.

We now need regulatory reforms to get all those industries that are leaving China into India. says, Strategic Affairs Expert Abhijit Iyer Mitra.

I would say that a ‘new era’ has dawned in Asia & the World.  Defence Analyst (Retd) Maj Gen (Dr) GD Bakshi.

The truth is that the bully has been taught a lesson & the dragon has agreed to retreat with its tail between its crippled legs. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

#ChinaPushedBack

localized.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, 3 days after PM Narendra Modi's Ladakh visit, India tamed ‘expansionist’ China. ‘Insider’ reveals the full story that it’s a ‘pushback’, not a ‘pullback’.

We now need regulatory reforms to get all those industries that are leaving China into India. says, Strategic Affairs Expert Abhijit Iyer Mitra.

snippet.title: Rahul Gandhi refuses to travel to frontline but has time to meet Chinese envoy? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, RaGa is a part of Parliamentary Standing Committee on Defence, which has till date met for 11 meetings between September 2019 & March 2020. But, Rahul Gandhi ‘Skipped’ all of them, confirms Chairman of Defence panel.

I don’t think that anybody can deny the import of a Parliamentary Standing Committee particularly on a strategic matter of defence. says, Congress Leader Sanjay Jha.

Perhaps Rahul Gandhi doesn’t wish to be a better Parliamentarian. His track record in the last Parliament session or in terms of attendance & questions were ‘pathetic'. says, BJP National Spokesperson Nalin Kohli.

Author Anand Ranganathan lists out 5 questions that RaGa has not yet answered over Indo-China standoff.

It’s disappointing that Rahul Gandhi hasn’t attended a single meeting, which I believe he should have. But it’s not the issue now. says, Political Analyst Sumanth Raman.

#RahulExposed

snippet.title: PM Narendra Modi's unprecedented visit to Leh Ladakh & hails Galwan gallantry | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, At 11,000 feet, PM Narendra Modi warns China against ‘Expansionism’, salutes the ‘Fire & fury’ of Forces & chants ‘Veer Bhogya Vasundhara’ but even today Opposition questions the government.

We need to understand that we're not talking about PM Narendra Modi as an individual, we're talking about our Prime Minister's visit. Prime Minister's visit was a message that our entire country is united. The opposition lost the 2014 elections badly, they lost 2019 elections even worse & they still don't seem to have taken ground inputs on how nationalism works. says, Strategic Affairs Expert Abhijit Iyer-Mitra.

The visit was the Prime Minister's duty. He paid homage to the braves by going to the ground instead of sitting in an air-conditioned office. says, Defence Expert Maj Gen GD Bakshi (Retd)

Every Indian’s head bows before the brave saviours. This land boasts of several stories of bravery & gallantry of Indian jawans. says, PM Narendra Modi while addressing the Forces. 

#ModiVisitsLeh

snippet.title: Lobby force toddler to relive trauma, 3-year-old's pain their political prop? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Sopore terror attack: Trauma of 3-yr-old kid becomes ‘political prop’ for a few sections of the society. This kid’s privacy has been ‘invaded’ which shows that Child Protection guidelines have been disregarded.  

There seems to be perceptions war which has broken out over the photograph of 3-yr-old kid. says, Senior Advocate Sanjay Hegde.

What we are faced is total war & it’s called ‘jehad’ (in J&K). In jehad, somebody who has just born, who’s about to die and everyone in between is a combatant. says, Kashmiri Pandit Sushil Pandit.

These lunatics are so consumed by the hatred for India that nothing is sacrosanct anymore, not even respecting the privacy of a traumatised baby. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

#ExploitingInnocence

On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Sensational new disclosure over Priyanka Gandhi Vadra's govt bungalow row. The story gets bigger today. 
Priyanka Gandhi Vadra's bungalow row: Priyanka Gandhi paid Rs 37,400/month as rent until last month. Her rent was increased by an average of Rs 1,700/year. The ordinary citizen has to pay Rs 20 lakh/ month for a Type VI bungalow.

snippet.title: China loses 9K cr 4G race, Will opposition still doubt NDA? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, India packs a 2nd big 'power punch' as PM Narendra Modi deletes his own Weibo account.

Samajwadi Party has always said that the biggest threat India faces is from China. says, SP Former Minister & Spokesperson Prof. Abhishek Mishra.

Govt of India is going step-by-step whatever needs to be done over China issue. says, BJP MP & National Spokesperson Dr Sudhanshu Trivedi. 

Steps like these (banning Chinese apps) have also been taken in UK & US against the Chinese 5G. It’s a worldwide move and nothing related to the LAC standoff. says, Political Analyst Abbas Hafeez Bhopal.

Lawyer Shehzad cites one of the statements made by a Samajwadi Party spokesperson on banning Chinese apps in the past which contradicts with the statement made by SP Former Minister & Spokesperson Prof. Abhishek Mishra.

snippet.title: India punishes China but opposition mocks, Martyrs deserve better | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, India banned 59 Chinese mobile apps. But Opposition hits out at govt over this ‘Digital’ strike.

It is for the 1st time that a decision has been taken and a decision that has sent out an unequivocal message. It is for the 1st time that a decision that has sent out an unequivocal message has been taken. This is a campaign that was spearheaded by the people of India. The govt has merely taken it to the next level and that should be welcomed. says, BJP National Spokesperson Amit Malviya. 

We need to teach this bully (China) a lesson. This was a defensive move. The fact of the matter is that the clock has been and is ‘Taking & Toking’ for China. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

#ModiDigitalDhamaka

snippet.title: PM Narendra Modi lays out priorities, Lazer-like focus on the poor? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, ‘Unmatched’ free food scheme: 80 crores poor to benefit. PM Narendra Modi walks 'Gaon-Garib' talk, but the Opposition questions the govt on the implementation of this scheme. 

I'd like to congratulate the Prime Minister for his vision. says, JD(U) Spokesperson Dr Ajay Alok.

The war of words between SP Spokesperson Ghanshyam Tiwari  & JD(U) Spokesperson Dr Ajay Alok over PM’s relief for poor.

We must ensure that our poor have enough food on their plates. says, BJP's  National Spokesperson Amit Malviya.

As a nation, you have to be rich to be pro-poor. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

#ModiCareForPoor

snippet.title: Chinese pullback contested, Are the questions justified? | India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar
snippet.description:
On India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar, the India China-LAC (Line of Actual Control) because there are several analysts, former military men who have come out and said that the Chinese are further into the Indian territory. There are satellite cartographic images show how the Chinese have successfully moved in and occupied vast tracks of Indian tracks. of Indian soil in at least 3 of the successful 4 contested areas in the Union Territory of Ladakh.

snippet.title: Congress-China nexus on file, ₹1.3 cr donations to Rajiv Gandhi foundation EXPOSED | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar: After seeing the visuals of our brave soldiers dominating the Chinese counterpart may have given people the pride towards the Indian Army. They made a sacrifice to thwart the Chinese People's Liberation Army at the eastern Ladakh region LAC.
On the other hand, the Congress party has not been able to bring itself to issuing a full-throated statement on the condemnation of the Chinese government and here's the reason for it. Times Now has exposed that Congress party took money from the Chinese Government. A donation of ₹1.3 crore donation from the Chinese embassy has been traced back to the Rajiv Gandhi foundation in 2005-06. Interestingly the board of the Rajiv Gandhi foundation comprises of the Gandhi family. Is this why the Congress party is soft on China? Why is the Chinese embassy under the list of General donors of the foundation? Why did the Congress party take China's money? 
Let's find out with our panel today!

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: Galwan Valley to Gogra China pullback on camera, Undeniable proof from LAC | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, From Galwan Valley to Gogra, China pullback caught on camera. ‘Surrender’ charge flops as undeniable proof from LAC shows India has forced back China. Army doubters apologise!

‘If satellite images are confirming that India has pushed back the Chinese considerably in Galwan Valley, will the Opposition hail this as a victory?’

Satellite images show India pushed back PLA by 5 km. Satellite images show retreat in Gogra-Hot springs also.

IMAGE 1: What it shows: India flag pins right up to the LAC in Galwan. What it means: India has pushed back China 5 km
IMAGE 2: What it shows: The Galwan Valley 5 km stretch. What it means: Shows no Chinese presence
IMAGE 3: What it shows: Proof of push back of Chinese by 5 km. What it means: The Chinese are no longer on land across LAC
IMAGE 4: What it shows: Close up pictures of Chinese medical camps. What it means: Chinese suffered massive casualties
IMAGE 5: What it shows: Close up pictures of ambulances and Mercedes. What it means: Chinese are now prepared for all eventualities

#ChinaPullbackProof

snippet.title: Congress admits 'China is superior' in 2013 but then doubts Indian army in 2020? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Times Now excesses the exclusive admission made by the UPA era minister, defence minister A.K Antony to questions asked of him in parliament. that the UPA failed to close the gap between China and building infrastructure that would have helped the armed forces better repulse any Chinese advance on our territory.

Take a look at Congress' 2013 ‘surrender’ admission. ‘Will Gandhi's clear air on MoU?’

Signed MoU with China in 2008, admits ‘China is superior’ in 2013 but Congress doubts Army in 2020. BJP questions Rahul Gandhi-China 'Deal'.

We must also remember that there was the Beijing Olympics in 2008 and Xi Jinping was not in power. A governmental deal is always under judicial scrutiny. says, Sr. Advocate Sanjay Hegde.

During the 2008 Beijing Olympics, China invited Sonia Gandhi but not Manmohan Singh. says, BJP National Spokesperson Sambit Patra.

#CongSurrenderAdmission

On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Times Now excesses the exclusive admission made by the UPA era minister, defence minister A.K Antony to questions asked of him in parliament. that the UPA failed to close the gap between China and building infrastructure that would have helped the armed forces better repulse any Chinese advance on our territory.

Take a look at Congress' 2013 ‘surrender’ admission. ‘Will Gandhi's clear air on MoU?’

Signed MoU with China in 2008, admits ‘China is superior’ in 2013 but Congress doubts Army in 2020. BJP questions Rahul Gandhi-China 'Deal'.

We must also remember that there was the Beijing Olympics in 2008 and Xi Jinping was not in power. A governmental deal is always under judicial scrutiny. says, Sr. Advocate Sanjay Hegde.

During the 2008 Beijing Olympics, China invited Sonia Gandhi but not Manmohan Singh. says, BJP National Spokesperson Sambit Patra.

#CongSurrenderAdmission

snippet.title: Saroofa Zargar granted bail after NDA's nod, Lutyens duplicity EXPOSED? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul ShivShakar, Saroofa Zargar got her bail based on humanitarian ground. The humane gesture was shown by the central government even after the courts have refused to bail her out thrice, despite not having much evidence. The Modi government slapped UAPA Act on Saroofa and made sure that she was put on trial. The accused has been released free and the case will continue simultaneously. The bail was read out on the Delhi High Court premises and the government gave their nod on certain conditions. Watch the video to know more!

snippet.title: Will the pro-China lobby apologise to the Indian forces for their oversight? I India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, see the debate on the maligning of the Indian forces by the lobby and the befitting reply of our jawans at the border fighting the Chinese with bravery and valour. The Congress and lobby have both time and again questioned our men and claimed they "surrendered" the Indian territory. Will these people now come forward and apologise to the army of our country? 

"I appeal to the nation to stand by our forces because 'it's not over'" says General Bakshi, Defence Analyst. 

The Congress has claimed that territory has been surrendered to the Chinese troops, however all evidence points otherwise. 

"INC's research department is as bad its election department possibly even worse" says Abhijit Iyer Mitra, Strategic Affairs Expert. 

The time has come for the lobby to acknowledge the sacrifice of our jawans and apologise for their words. 

#IndiaPushesBackChina

snippet.title: Supreme Court allows Jagannath Yatra but critics slam the centre I India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, the decision of the Supreme Court to allow the Jaggannath Rath Yatra has sparked a massive debate across the country. What is more important, prayer or pandemic? The Gujarat government has also now decided to move SC with a petition to allow religious festivities. 

The critics and the petitioner have called this decision irresponsible but significant precautions and conditions have been placed by the SC to regulate the crowd. Will this decision lead the state of Odisha to chaos and unravel its healthcare system with a case surge it can not handle? 

See this video and decide between threat or tradition. 
#JagannathYatraAllowed

snippet.title: PM Modi's STRONG message over India-China LAC standoff DECODED| India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar
snippet.description:
On this special edition of India Upfront, we decode Prime Minister Narendra Modi's STERN message over India-China LAC standoff. 
Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday paid homage to the Indian soldiers who lost their lives in Galwan Valley clash and said that entire nation is proud of the sacrifice made by the braves in Ladakh. He sent out the strongest message: ‘No one can eye Indian land’.
"China has arrived as a superpower. Anyone who decides to become close ally with U.S will face the wrath of China", said Amitabh Mattoo, Padma Shree Awardee, Prof of International Relations at JNU & Melbourne tells Rahul Shivshankar.
"China has a huge trade advantage over us at a time when the Western world is cutting trade with China', says Captain Alok Bansal, Dir, India Foundation.
Listen in to Rahul Shivshankar on INDIA UPFRONT Special Edition.

snippet.title: Congress disarmed our braves first & now supports 'Tukde' ethos? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Congress 'Tukde' mindset on tape that hopes for Chinese occupation & want 'Ladakh ke tukde-tukde'. First Congress ‘Disarmed’ our soldiers and now, mocks martyrs sacrifice. 

Listen in to the conversation between expelled Cong Councillor Zakir Hussain & his friend where he berates our Army & lauds Chinese Forces. The ultimate insult to our martyrs, the ‘treachery’ caught on tape. ‘Will Rahul Gandhi condemns this?’

Listen in to Political Analyst Nishant Verma hits out at govt over Indo-China standoff.

PM Narendra Modi's remarks at an all-party meeting on China. PM Modi said that ‘we gave China a befitting response’. PM confirms: No land has been captured by China.

snippet.title: All-Parties unite behind India but Sonia Gandhi won't slam China? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, A very crucial All-Party meeting is continuing in the national capital. Prime Minister is holding this meet & he is saying to every party which has a substantial national footprint. the leaders of those parties are speaking turn by turn, & most of the leaders, in fact, there are only four parties left to speak but all the political party's till now have come out & reaffirmed their weight in PM leadership. all parties except Sonia Gandhi led Congress Party, this is the party which has not followed.

‘Instead of seeking to achieve a unanimous consensus on china & evolve a bipartisan stand on the way ahead, has the Congress put party interests above the nation's by choosing to criticise the govt?’

‘Is it not the responsibility of the Opposition to hold the government of the day to account, and by asking questions of the government, isn't the Congress doing its job?’

#IndiaFirstNotForCong

snippet.title: Congress-China deal exposed, Why betrayed Indian forces? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, On a day when we have fresh inputs on how bravely our forces fought to give a bloody nose to the Chinese military despite being outnumbered. Rahul Gandhi has insulted their valour. now we know that our fighting man is meant of honour, they are extremely well known for their discipline. for adhering to convention, treaties, agreements but today Congress leader insinuated that the Army went in unarmed into combat, into a theatre of action along with a hot LAC.

‘Is Congress in any position to accuse the current govt on China when the root of the problem can be traced to its own alleged mishandling of text of 1993 agreement, as per Lt Gen. Shekatkar (Retd), who was part of the drafting process?’

‘Is it or is it not true that there were serious differences of opinion during the drafting of 1993 agreement, and many resigned over the alleged favouritism of Cong toward some bureaucrats?’ 

#CongBetraysBraves

snippet.title: China's attack was pre-planned, Why did they lied about 'De-Escalation'? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, China’s attack was pre-planned as it lied about de-escalation. Satellite images expose China’s deceit. PM Narendra Modi thunders a warning & makes big Uri-Pulwama like a pledge. Acted then, will extract price now. 

India calls out china's bluff. With the truth tumbling out of the Chinese closet, it was no surprise that the MEA accused China of a ‘Pre-planned, pre-meditated attack’.

PM Narendra Modi always walks the talk. When the naysayers questioned the govt's will after Uri & Pulwama, a pledge was made by the PM to avenge our martyrs. 

India’s warning impacts China. Chinese analysts sound alarmed as China fears the loss of trade.

As Beijing gets a bloody nose, the world lauds India's might. China plays Twitter tricks by deleting anti-China tweets & tagging them 'toxic'. U.S veteran exposes the nexus.

#IndiaWillPunishChina

localized.title: China's attack was pre-planned, Why did they lied about 'De-Escalation'? | India Upfront
localized.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, China’s attack was pre-planned as it lied about de-escalation. Satellite images expose China’s deceit. PM Narendra Modi thunders a warning & makes big Uri-Pulwama like a pledge. Acted then, will extract price now. 

India calls out china's bluff. With the truth tumbling out of the Chinese closet, it was no surprise that the MEA accused China of a ‘Pre-planned, pre-meditated attack’.

PM Narendra Modi always walks the talk. When the naysayers questioned the govt's will after Uri & Pulwama, a pledge was made by the PM to avenge our martyrs. 

India’s warning impacts China. Chinese analysts sound alarmed as China fears the loss of trade.

As Beijing gets a bloody nose, the world lauds India's might. China plays Twitter tricks by deleting anti-China tweets & tagging them 'toxic'. U.S veteran exposes the nexus.

#IndiaWillPunishChina

snippet.title: India inflicts casualties on China's Army, Is this just a warning for Dragon? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, China’s betrayal at Galwan as it breaks 45-year long peace, 3 including Major martyred. India’s Army stands its ground & inflicts casualties on China. Braves send a clear message & warns China, this isn’t the India of 1962.

 MEA releases official statement on Indo-China standoff saying ‘India & China have been discussing de-escalation. Chinese side departed from the consensus’. 

 Key takeaways from MEA’s official statement on Indo-China standoff. 
•Chinese departed from LAC consensus 
•Chinese unilaterally changed the status quo
•Onus of casualties only on China  
•All activities only on Indian land
•Committed to ensuring sovereignty

MEA’s official statement is still not strong enough on Indo-China standoff. The blame on the Chinese must have been ‘much clearer’ in MEA’s statement. says, Former Foreign Secretary Kanwal Sibal.

There has been no exchange of fire along LAC between India & China since 1969 except a brief ambush in 1970. says, Defence Analyst Maj Gen GD Bakshi.

#ChinaMustPay

snippet.title: Pakistan's 'Sex Terror' on Kashmir woman exposed, Armed to unleash sexual horror? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Unimpeachable visual evidence, 1st time ever on national TV. Armed to unleash sexual terror: Cache of Viagra, condoms & porn and 10 packets of contraceptive pills. There’s nothing holy about this!

TIMES NOW tracks down a victim, who lived to tell the tale of ‘Sex terrorism’. Listen in to what she was forced to endure after she was abducted at gunpoint.

Innocents of Kashmir exploited. Listen in to the plight of a father whose daughter was being victimised as a ‘Sex slave’.

‘Since the lobby repeatedly talks of alleged rights violations by the Armed Forces, what about the human rights that terrorists have systematically violated?’

It has to be said that Kashmir has been turned into a ‘Snakes & Ladders’ game. The ladders are provided by Pakistan & snakes by Indians. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

snippet.title: Indian staffers abducted for fake hit & run charge, Dialogue doves embolden Pak? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Abduction in Islamabad after espionage in Delhi. Pak kidnaps 2 Indian officials who have been slapped with fake hit & run charge. Pak mocks diplomatic norms. ‘Time to Punish Kidnapper Pak?’

ISI abducts 2 Indian officials in Islamabad. Indian High Commission kept in dark about the arrest as fake 'Hit & run' charge slapped for their arrest. 

Pak lies caught out. Take a look at the contradictions that EXPOSED Pakistan. 

TIMES NOW's Prashant confronts the acting High Commissioner of Pakistan & asked him why Indian staffers were abducted but he dodges the question.

Pak peddles ‘Hit & run’ narrative’ as it releases document after 12 hours. ‘Road accident’ is a face-saver by President Imran Khan as Pak paints abduction as an arrest. 

Breaking on Times Now: 2 Indian High Commission officials have been released: Pakistan media.

The entire edifice of Pakistan is founded upon hatred for Hinduism and for India. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

Pak foreign ministry has revealed the name of Indian officials who were involved in the road incident. says, Journalist Omar Altaf.

#PunishKidnapperPak

snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Disquiet over Sushant Rajput’s death: Professional bullying charge. The lens on Bollywood A-listers as Shekhar Kapur says he knows & Kangana Ranaut shames B-Town VIPs. ‘Who let down Sushant Singh?’ 

Sushant Singh was searching for a ‘Library’ in a ‘Fishmarket’. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.
